sceneDescription.title: Ben Gunn Emerges from the Jungle

characters.appearance: Wild man, 30s, sun-darkened skin, matted hair and beard
characters.action: Peering out with mixture of fear and hope

characters.appearance: Boy, 13 years old, startled and wary
characters.action: Hand reaching for small knife at belt

scene.mainElements: Mysterious wild man revealing himself to lone boy in deep jungle, moment of mutual fear and recognition
scene.details: Thick vines and tropical plants creating green walls, shafts of golden light piercing canopy, exotic birds calling above, massive tree roots crossing path, wild man's makeshift tools visible at waist, boy's footprints in muddy path showing his journey
scene.background: Dense jungle in all directions, suggestion of hidden caves nearby
scene.atmosphere: Primal encounter, lost civilization, hope emerging from wildness, fairy tale meeting

composition.focus: The moment of contact between wild man and boy
composition.depth: Wild man partially hidden by vegetation foreground, boy on path middle ground, jungle depths background
